Package gameai.models.othello

Class OthelloBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameai.models.Board
      • gameai.models.othello.OthelloBoard
  • public class OthelloBoard
extends Board
    This class serves as an implementation of the game Othello / Reversi.
